name: RoadPipe
description:
RoadPipe is a game that use a classic pipe game into the road traffic, by clicking on the road to rotate it, or using items to make the car reach its destination in the same color as the car.

Currently, 3 Areas, 18 stages are opend, and different gimmicks are applied to each area. New Area will be continuously added as a future update.

Solve problems in your own way with the right timing and the right items!




[Stop Item]
It's a kind of barricade that can be placed between roads and block the flow of the road for 5 seconds.


[Slow Item]
Slows the car on the road where the effect is applied. However, the effect is permanent in stage and needs to be considered.
